content: section row 185 knit all stitches row 186 k3 sm p to marker sm k3 row 187-190 repeat the last 2 row 185-186 twice more increase section row 191 rs k3 sm *yo k1 repeat from * to marker sm k3 you now have 1158 stitches 1152 in centre body and 3 on each edge row 192 ws k3 sm p to marker sm k3 cast off using a loose or stretchy method i used jenny s very stretchy bindoff weave in ends wash and block stretching slightly to match suggested measurements for a nice looking ruffle i suggest pinning down the border just at the last increase and fluffing the last row of the ruffled edge gently with your fingers then letting it dry enjoy your shawl �15 of 1� 5
